name: Theyyam Performance
description: Experience the divine connection through Theyyam's fiery dances and sacred rituals.

name: Kalari Demonstration
description: Witness the ancient martial art of Kalaripayattu, blending agility, strength, and tradition.

name: Kathakali Drama
description: Explore the vibrant storytelling through Kathakali's elaborate costumes and facial expressions.

name: Mohiniyattam Performance
description: Feel the grace and elegance of Mohiniyattam, Kerala's mesmerizing classical dance.

name: Onam Festival Parade
description: Celebrate Onam with vibrant parades and flower arrangements symbolizing joy and unity.

name: Snake Boat Race
description: Feel the thrill of the traditional Snake Boat Race on Kerala's tranquil backwaters.

name: Aranmula Mirror Crafting
description: Discover the secrets of crafting the unique Aranmula metal mirrors.

name: Thrissur Pooram Festival
description: Experience the grandeur of Thrissur Pooram, Kerala's iconic temple festival.

name: Pulikali Performance
description: Enjoy the playful yet artistic Pulikali, where performers paint themselves as tigers.

name: Nettur Petti Making
description: Learn about the intricate craftsmanship behind Kerala's Nettur Petti jewel boxes.

name: Vallam Kali Preparation
description: Get an inside look at the rigorous preparation for Vallam Kali boat races.

name: Kathakali Makeup Artistry
description: Explore the detailed process of Kathakali makeup, an art in itself.

name: Chenda Melam Performance
description: Feel the rhythm and power of Chenda Melam, Kerala's traditional percussion.
